title.narrative: Supporting the adoption and implementation of accrual-based IPSAS in Zimbabwe

description.narrative: Public Sector Accounting Professionals in Zimbabwe

The first phase of an additional project to strengthen the accountancy profession in Zimbabwe through support to the Public Accountants and Auditors Board, Zimbabwe (PAAB) and other beneficiaries by the Chartered Institute of Public Finance and Accounting (CIPFA).
Launched under the International Federation of Accountants (IFAC) Professional Accounting Organization (PAO) Capacity Building Program funded by DFID.
To hold public stakeholder consultations leading to formal adoption of International Public Sector Accounting Standards (IPSAS) as the basis for public financial accounting in Zimbabwe.
